inventory.name: Facial Serium
inventory.description: A lightweight, fast-absorbing facial serum that deeply hydrates and nourishes the skin. Packed with essential nutrients, it enhances skin elasticity and reduces signs of aging. Perfect for daily skincare routines to achieve a radiant, healthy glow.

inventory.name: Formal Bag
inventory.description: A sleek and durable backpack designed for modern travelers and professionals. Features multiple compartments for organized storage and a padded section for laptops. Lightweight yet sturdy, ensuring comfort and style on the go.

inventory.name: Kids wear
inventory.description: A trendy and comfortable outfit for active kids, featuring a soft hoodie and breathable sneakers. Designed with vibrant colors and a playful aesthetic for style and fun. Ideal for casual wear, ensuring both warmth and flexibility.

inventory.name: Premium sofa
inventory.description: A sophisticated, high-quality sofa with a modern and minimalistic design. Crafted with premium fabric and plush cushioning for superior comfort and elegance. Perfect for enhancing any living space with timeless charm and functionality.
